snippet.title: THE SPIRIT LIFT Announcement Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Prettysmart games is proud to announce our latest project: THE SPIRIT LIFT! 

👻 🏨  THE SPIRIT LIFT is a deck-building rogue-like horror adventure set in a haunted hotel.

➕ Add THE SPIRIT LIFT to your wishlist on Steam 
➕ https://store.steampowered.com/app/1727590/THE_SPIRIT_LIFT/

🔎 It’s the 1990s. A magical elevator awakens in an abandoned hotel as several teenagers enter on a dare. They’re about to get the ride of their life, because this place is haunted on so many levels!

⬆️ Make it to the top and fight the boss to learn the hotel’s secrets. And if your team checks out early? Be kind, rewind, and better luck next time…

👻 🏨 Visit https://www.thespiritlift.com to learn more and watch the game come to life on https://www.twitch.tv/DrMikachu!

💖 Become a Patron and support our indie game studio! 
💖 https://www.patreon.com/prettysmartgames 

⚠️  THE SPIRIT LIFT is still in development. Follow us on our social channels to stay up to date on our progress! ⚠️

#THESPIRITLIFT #prettysmartgames #indiegames #deckbuilding #roguelike
